page.title: 04Vegetable Packing:Chatteris
page.content: Whitworth's Food Group started as a private company about 20 years ago. Early in 1985 it became a public company. Its present location is at the northern end of Chatteris. There are approximately{280 people working at Whitworth's. Of these about {75% are female, 25% are male workers. Many of these come from outside of Chatteris e.g. Wimblington and March. Apart from those involved in the packing itself e.g. packers, forklift drivers, production managers, there are lorry drivers and mechanics and a range of office staff. The firm packs vegetables such as potatoes, onions, carrots. Fruit is bought and distributed but not packed. Local farmers supply a lot of the produce. They also have their own co-operative for storage. Out of season produce is purchased abroad.
